text: Luigi Natoli (June 15, 1799 – February 24, 1875) was a Sicilian Roman Catholic priest. He was born in Patti, in north-eastern Sicily. He was ordained on March 2, 1822; was appointed bishop of the Caltagirone on March 15, 1858; and became archbishop of Messina on February 22, 1867. He died on February 24, 1875. ==References== == Further reading == * Scritti vari di Monsignor Natoli, Tip. Del Progresso, Messina 1877. * F. Pisciotta, Natoli Luigi, in F. Armetta (ed.), Dizionario Enciclopedico dei Pensatori e Teologi di Sicilia. Secc. XIX- XX, Palermo 2010. Category:1799 births Category:1875 deaths Category:19th- century Roman Catholic archbishops Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Luigi Natoli
